About Me

Full-stack designer, Certified Usability Analyst (CUA™) by HFI and a Nepalese, have eight plus (8+) years of experience in UX/UI Design and UI Development, been with start-ups to large tech companies, created huge impact on leading product definition and development, improving user-experience in B2B and B2C software products.
